metadata.title: CVE-2022-34174 jenkins: Observable timing discrepancy allows determining username validity (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: In Jenkins 2.355 and earlier, LTS 2.332.3 and earlier, an observable timing discrepancy on the login form allows distinguishing between login attempts with an invalid username, and login attempts with a valid username and wrong password, when using the Jenkins user database security realm.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
